dmca.title: DMCA
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Cyberia IT [mailto:neo@cyberia.ca] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2006 8:26 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA 


  
April 5, 2006
 
Sender Information:
Prozilla.com
Debra Boniface, Owner
neo@cyberia.ca
1-403-668-1732
103 Fairways Drive
Airdrie, Alberta Canada
T4B2Y5

 
Recipient Information:
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries
Name of Agent Designated to Receive Notification of Claimed Infringement
George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
re: [designshrinedemos.com (IP 67.19.83.100)] 

Dear ThePlanet.com 
 
I, Debra Boniface, owner of Prozilla.com certify under penalty of perjury,
that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights. 

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their
agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand
that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing. 

My contact information is as follows:

Prozilla.com
Debra Boniface, Owner
neo@cyberia.ca
1-403-668-1732
103 Fairways Drive
Airdrie, Alberta Canada
T4B2Y5



Allegedly Infringing items or materials: 

I have asked in writing for the website owner to remove my works however
they continualy refuse. I am not aware of how many of there sites they have
installed on their server other than the two below. As proof of the work, I
ask you to visit the following url on your network which will reinstall the
database tables for our script. Once the database tables have been
repopulated visit the site admin at the URL directly below the install.php
URL and click on settings, you will see the default email address is
neo@cyberia.ca (our email address). This script is actually our classifieds
script modified.
 
http://www.designshrinedemos.com/wedding/install.php
http://www.designshrinedemos.com/wedding/siteadmin (admin/admin) click on
settings.
http://www.designshrinedemos.com/legal/ 
 
ORIGINAL URL
 
http://www.turnkeyzone.com/demos/classifieds/
http://www.turnkeyzone.com/demos/classifieds/siteadmin
<http://www.designshrinedemos.com/wedding/siteadmin>  (admin/admin) click on
settings to compare.
 
 

Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in consideration of
the above: 

http://www.designshrinedemos.com/wedding/ (using our classifieds scripts)
http://www.turnkeyzone.com/demos/legal (using our realty scripts)

Location of ORIGINAL WORKS:
http://www.turnkeyzone.com/demos/classifieds/
http://www.turnkeyzone.com/demos/realty 
 


My actual or electronic signature follows: 


Sincerely, 
/s/ Debra Boniface
Owner/Operator
